thread.title: customer
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by customer

author: customer
title: customer
text: I bought two jackets at great prices. I live in Ireland and the delivery charge was reasonable. To my delight they were dispatched on the same day and arrived within 2 days. One was too small (I was probably being optimistic) and I returned it on a Monday. By Friday my refund was in my account. I do most of my clothes and accessory shopping for myself and my children online and this was incredibly efficient service.
